content.en: Process optimization: Scientists have been using algorithms to optimize various industrial processes, such as the production of polyethylene terephthalate, purified terephthalic acid, epoxy polymers, and more. These algorithms, like the non-dominated sorting genetic algorithm and the genetic algorithm, help researchers uncover optimal operating conditions and improve the efficiency of these processes. By applying multi-objective evolutionary algorithms, scientists are gaining valuable insights and making advancements in the field of chemicals production reactors.
content.da: Procesoptimering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at optimere forskellige industrielle processer, såsom produktionen af polyethylenterephthalat, renset terephthalsyre, epoxy-polymerer og mere. Disse algoritmer, som den ikke-dominerede sorteringsgenetiske algoritme og den genetiske algoritme, hjælper forskere med at opdage optimale driftsbetingelser og forbedre effektiviteten af disse processer. Ved at anvende multiobjektive evolutionære algoritmer opnår forskere værdifuld indsigt og gør fremskridt inden for området for kemikalieproduktionsreaktorer.
